explains: adv. 横向；交叉地；斜地；成十字状地

sentences.en: A crosswise street; the crosswise dimension.
sentences.cn: 横向的街道；横向的尺寸。

sentences.en: Cut the dough crosswise into four equal pieces.
sentences.cn: 将面团切成大小相等的四块。

sentences.en: It was deserted except for a lone boy seated crosswise on a swing.
sentences.cn: 里面没有别人，只有一个男孩孤零零横着坐在秋千上。
